title.rendered: Static Clinic and Smile on Wheels van supported by HDB Financial Services to provide quality healthcare

content.rendered:
Static Clinic and Smile on Wheels van supported by HDB Financial Services to provide quality healthcare

 

HDB is supporting Smile Foundation in setting up a clinic to provide physiotherapy as well as OPD services to the beneficiaries. The clinic will operate for 22 days every month. It will be located at Sanjay Gandhi Transport Nagar, Delhi.It seeks to serve unreached and underserved populations, , primarily truck drivers.

The physiotherapy services are meant to meet the specialized health care needs of the truck drivers as they suffer from several health issues such as bone ailments, back pain, neck pain etc. The clinic will cater to up to 50 beneficiaries per day (physiotherapy and general check up).

As part of generating awareness on health related issues, IEC activities will also be conducted, including distribution of pamphlets, display of posters, wall writing and audio visual aids, etc. The activities will revolve around the health needs of the truckers’ community.

We are also working together on increasing access to primary healthcare at doorstep through Smile on Wheels in Thirvallur District , Tamil Nadu.

The proposed locations for the mobile medical unit are Thiruvallur, Kakalur, Uthukottai, and Thiruninravur in Thiruvallur district and Sriperumbudur in Kanchipuram district in Tamil Nadu. The project will address the needs of the most vulnerable within the community, that is women and children. The community at large will also be served.

The project has the following objectives:

  • To reduce out of pocket expenses by providing outpatient services
  • To improve health seeking behaviour and increase supply of quality health services
  • To reduce burden on government health facilities
  • To curb the spread of COVID-19 pandemic
  • To ensure safe motherhood for pregnant and lactating mothers
  • To ensure menstrual health and hygiene

The project also seeks to create sustainable models of intervention by strengthening VHSNC, institutional partnerships and referral linkages.

HDB partners with Smile Foundation to support healthcare for the underprivileged children and families

HDB has partnered with Smile Foundation to support healthcare for the underprivileged children and families in the Sonbhadra district of Uttar Pradesh since 2018. The underprivileged and weaker sections of society suffer from adverse health conditions owing to lack of accessibility, availability and affordability of basic healthcare services in urban slums & remote rural areas. Smile Foundation addresses the issues of adverse healthcare facilities by bringing quality healthcare services at doorsteps through mobile medical unit, Smile on Wheels; promoting healthcare awareness and healthcare seeking behavior among the underprivileged.

HDB Financial Services (HDBFS) is a leading Non-Banking Financial Company (NBFC) that caters to the growing needs of an Aspirational India, serving both Retail & Commercial Clients. Our lines of business include – Lending and BPO Services.
